MOP_AMOUNT.NAME: Maximum amount of liquid allowed to be mopped
MOP_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Kg of liquid in tile possible to be mopped

NUMERIC_UP_DOWN.DESCRIPTION:
Hold Shift to alter value for 10 at once
Hold Shift+Ctrl to alter value for 100 at once

UNBIND.NAME: To Unbind: Press "Delete" while on changing HotKey screen
